summary: Comprehensive testing of Profile Page feature for GuessIt football prediction app. All backend APIs (29 tests) passed. Frontend Profile Page fully tested including all sections, buttons, and navigation flows.
critical_code_review_comments: Level thresholds are correctly synchronized between frontend (ProfilePage.jsx) and backend (predictions.py)
All profile page sections have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Good use of React memoization with memo() for StatCard, AchievementBadge, FavoriteTeamCard, RecentActivityItem components
Clean separation of concerns with distinct sections for stats, activity, favorites, achievements, and performance

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All profile page features working correctly

seed_data_creation: Used existing test user from previous iteration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Profile page is fully implemented and working. All data-testid attributes are correctly placed. User has 1 prediction on Barcelona SC vs AA Argentinos Juniors match (picked Home win, pending result).
verified_features: Profile page loads correctly when logged in - PASS
Profile header shows user avatar, nickname (TestPlayer), email, level badge (Level 0) - PASS
Level progress bar displays correctly (shows '100 pts to Level 1') - PASS
Stats grid shows predictions (1), correct (0), wrong (0), and points (0) - PASS
Recent Activity section displays latest predictions (Barcelona SC vs AA Argentinos Juniors, 19 Feb, Picked 1) - PASS
Favorite Teams section displays 'No favorite teams yet' with Browse Matches button - PASS
Achievements section shows 1/6 unlocked (First Prediction unlocked) - PASS
Performance section shows 0% win rate circle chart, 0 Wins, 0 Losses, 1 Pending - PASS
Settings button is present and clickable (shows toast 'Settings coming soon!') - PASS
Logout button works correctly (redirects to home page after logout) - PASS
Predictions stat card is clickable (navigates to /my-predictions) - PASS
Page redirects to login when not authenticated - PASS
notes: The Profile page implements all requested features including user info display, stats grid, recent activity, favorite teams, achievements system, and performance metrics with win rate circle chart. All components are properly animated with fade-in effects.
